name: Deon
description: Deon is a command line tool that allows you to easily add an ethics checklist to your data science projects. We support creating a new, standalone checklist file or appending a checklist to an existing analysis in many common formats.

openlicenses.openLicenseEvidenceURLs: SDG10: Reduced Inequalities,SDG17: Partnerships for the Goals

openStandards: Input in in a standard YML format and output is simple markdown or HTML https://deon.drivendata.org/#custom-checklists Pep 8

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

privacy.privacyCompliance: The digital solution is an open-source package. Other people may use this library in their own projects or to work with their own data. It does not collect/store any data (PII or otherwise). The digital solution is an open-source package. Other people may use this library in their own projects or to work with their own data. It does not collect/store any data (PII or otherwise).
